-= Voyant, Inc =- Austin, TX - http://www.planwithvoyant.com/ Lead System Administrator/Engineer/DevOps

Full-time. Austin-based. ONSITE (local really required at this time, Relocation and immigration visa sponsorship is not currently available.)

Voyant is seeking a talented System Admin / DevOp Engineer to overhaul and upgrade our development and deployment systems.

The successful candidate will have expertise with Linux, and experience building, configuring, and maintaining production deployments, ideally using Amazon Web Services (AWS) EC2.

Primary Responsibility Leverage Amazon AWS services to design new and improve existing Voyant EC2 deployments. Continuously improve maintainability, monitoring, security and scalability of Voyant production environments.

Experience and Skills: AWS DevOps Engineering Certification (If not, we will encourage and sponsor your certification on the job) Expertise with virtualization technology and methods *Configuration management experience (Ansible, Chef, Puppet)

If you are looking for a company where you can have a major impact, contact us at jobs@planwithvoyant.com.
